Lyric:
[by:废柴机器人]
[00:02.310]Yeah, heh, rumors
[00:07.660]
[00:07.890][Verse 1]
[00:08.330]Yeah, we the word up on the streets
[00:09.560]They talk, talk, talk 'bout you and me
[00:11.340]Let's start some rumors, rumors
[00:15.790]And no, I don't know where they came from
[00:17.740]But I'm always down to make some, rumors, rumors
[00:22.980]Yeah, they saw me sneaking out your crib last night
[00:26.380]3 A.M. to catch a flight
[00:28.150]Caught me driving through your hood
[00:30.000]Paparazzi got me good
[00:31.280]
[00:31.570][Pre-Hook]
[00:32.230]We like stars, yeah baby, they astronomers
[00:34.030]Look at everybody camping out with they binoculars
[00:35.960]All up in the headlines, me and the wifey
[00:37.980]But let them gossip girl, Blake Lively
[00:38.980]
[00:39.610][Hook]
[00:40.210]I don't know where they're getting their news
[00:43.940]But I'm not mad if tonight it comes true
[00:47.870]Ooh, let's start some rumors
[00:49.940]I'mma start some rumors with you, with you
[00:54.500]I wanna start some rumors with you
[00:58.050]Yeah, rumors, I wanna start some rumors with you
[01:05.990]Yeah, rumors, I wanna start some....
[01:09.670]
[01:10.420][Verse 2]
[01:11.600]Man, how the hell they spread so fast
[01:13.780]Yeah, my homie called and asked
[01:15.510]"Have you heard the rumors?" Wait what? Rumors
[01:19.420]Yeah, we the topic of the town
[01:21.400]We might as well just own it now
[01:23.480]It ain't no rumor, no, it ain't no rumor
[01:27.470]They caught us hooking up all in my whip
[01:29.980]Man, I needa tint that shit
[01:32.000]Now your cell is blowing up like
[01:34.030]"Oh my god tell me everything"
[01:36.220]We like stars, yeah baby, they astronomers
[01:36.230]
[01:36.500][Pre-Hook]
[01:38.140]Look at everybody camping out with they binoculars
[01:40.210]All up in the headlines, me and the wifey
[01:42.180]But let them gossip girl, Blake Lively
[01:42.930]
[01:43.420][Hook]
[01:44.150]I don't know where they're getting their news
[01:47.860]But I'm not mad if tonight it comes true
[01:52.140]Ooh, let's start some rumors
[01:54.030]I'mma start some rumors with you, with you
[01:58.480]I wanna start some rumors with you
[02:02.000]Yeah, rumors, I wanna start some rumors with you
[02:09.980]Yeah, rumors, I wanna start some....
[02:14.520]
[02:14.860][Bridge]
[02:16.570]No we don't care if somebody knows, body knows
[02:20.670]People talking that's just how it goes, how it goes
[02:24.360]You know we love to keep them on they toes, on they toes
[02:28.460]Yeah, so start a rumor tonight
[02:30.170]If they ain't talking we ain't doing it right
[02:31.100]
[02:31.600][Hook]
[02:32.220]I don't know where they're getting their news
[02:35.660]But I'm not mad if tonight it comes true
[02:39.680]Ooh, let's start some rumors
[02:41.870]I'mma start some rumors with you, with you
[02:44.130]
[02:44.600][Outro]
[02:46.370]I wanna start some rumors with you
[02:51.310]I wanna start some rumors
[02:54.370]I wanna start some rumors with you
[02:58.980]I wanna start some, I wanna start some, yeah
[03:02.730]Rumors
